reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: General Education Quality Improvement Project - GEQIP Phase II (Geqip II)- Local fund

description.narrative: Il GEQIP è un progetto integrato per il miglioramento della qualità del settore educativo nel paese. Intende fornire libri di testo e guide per gli insegnanti, migliorare le capacita' e le conoscenze degli insegnanti, rafforzare i programmi di miglioramento delle scuole attraverso gli school grants e rafforzare le capacita' di gestione, leadership e pianificazione a tutti i livelli del settore educativo.

The General Education Quality Improvement Project (GEQIP) is a comprehensive and integrated project to improve the quality of general education in Ethiopia through a Multi-Donor Joint Fund managed by the World Bank and coordinated by the Ministry of Education (MoE). GEQIP intends to provide textbooks and guides for teachers based on new curricula, improve teacher skills and knowledge, strengthen school-building improvement programs through school grants, and strengthen management, leadership and planning skills at all levels of education. Italy has been participating since 2009 at GEQIP.
